name: HELP (itch) (GameOfHelp)
description:
HELP is a game made by GamesOfHelp. Based on the classic game: Asteroids, you have to destroy incoming asteroids, without getting hit. You can move your Spaceship/Player with the WASD keys on your keyboard. Shoot lasers by left clicking.

In Easy mode, you will have to obtain 500 points. A new Asteroid will spawn every 5 seconds. You will have 50 HP. Your End result is set with this form:

points + hp

In Normal mode, you will have to obtain 2.500 points. A new Asteroid will spawn every 5 seconds. You will have 25 HP. Your End result is set with this form:

points + hp

In Hard mode, you will have to obtain 10.000 points. A new Asteroid will spawn every 5 seconds. You will have 1 HP. Your End result is set with this form:

points + hp

The Purge will happen every 900 Points gathered. Every asteroid and laser will be destroyed. This is to reduce lag.


Coding: GameOfHelp & Griffpatch

User Interface: GameOfHelp & PremiumBanana

Graphics: GameOfHelp & Scratch
